column3: Spike in Google searches for 'Myanmar amber'

column2: Myanmar Protection of Antique Objects Law - no export of fossils except for temporary display or scientific preservation work
Myanmar Gemstone Law - classifies amber as a gemstone
Citizenship law - Rohingya denied Burmese citizenship
Myanmar Antiquities Act - classifies fossils as antiquities and cannot be exported without specific permits
